scenario_text.value:
Don’t mention it. This sort of thing is
nothing for a friend.
Did you two have encounters like that, too?
Yeah... Takuma helped me get through mine.

I just threw my two cents in. Aoi didn’t give
up, so she was able to meet up with Labramon.

I see... Then I can’t just sit here feeling
sorry for myself.

I’ll definitely find the real Floramon, then
give Arukenimon something to cry about!

I won’t pity myself anymore! We have to go,
Takuma!
